title: Liru Professional Care Vitamin C+E Antioxidant Serum 30 ML
description:
Description
Liru Professional Care Vitamin C+E Antioxidant Serum 30 ML

Vitamin E + C Serum with Collagen Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that stimulates collagen production in your skin. It also fights fine lines and brightens your complexion, leaving skin with a brighter appearance. It also removes pigmentation for a more even skin tone. Skin care experts also describe it as one of the best anti-aging ingredients you can use. Vitamin E is well known for its benefits on skin health and appearance. It can be applied topically to your face to reduce inflammation and make your skin look younger. -Brand:Liru -Professional Skin care -Vitamin C+E -20% Antioxidant serum -Collagen -Multifunction essence

Net Quantity: 30ml
